title: Events Calendar
cleaned_text: many of our programs online. IMC has opened in-person programs for people who are fully vaccinated. Masks are no longer required. IMC is committed to creating a safe and welcoming practice environment for all.To view the standalone events calendar, click [here](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?src=imc.events.mgs%40gmail.com&ctz=America%2FLos_Angeles). To access the calendar from other applications, click [here (iCal)](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/imc.events.mgs%40gmail.com/public/basic.ics). We are currently having trouble with how our calendar events are displayed. We have temporarily reverted to using the Classic Google calendar while we figure this out. Ignore the IMC Special Events Title. This really is the entire IMC Calendar. Thank you for your patience.
